Name: Fruit Juice
About the game: About This game is a simulation fast food Fruit Juice game. First of all, you have to play the role of the receptionist and firmly remember what the guests ordered. Only the correct dishes can bring income, and the wrong dishes must be compensated for the guests. Secondly, Serve guests the right coffee Latte Art. Third, you have to prepare Cocktail for the guests, according to the requirements of the guests, if it is wrong, it may lead to failure. Fourth, you have to make hot Juice for the guests. The guests will ask for differentJuice, etc., and you need to record them immediately. Fifth, you have to mix and stir the juice for the guest, according to the guest's requirements until he is satisfied. Feature The difficulty of the game increases dramatically as the levels increase, making it ideal for those who are more than willing to challenge themselves.
